alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 20 at 1:27PM AKDT until March 21 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Highs winds, snow and blowing snow with blizzard conditions at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting to 55 mph. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are now occuring. Snow and blowing snow are expected to continue into Tuesday. The strongest winds and worst conditions will be near the coast through late this afternoon. Winds are expected to decrease tonight.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
